title: Easy ride to delhi
description: A simple and elegant dessert made by melting chocolate and adding toppings. Perfect for gifting or snacking, this bark combines rich chocolate with texture and crunch.
steps: Break the chocolate into small pieces and melt it in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water (double boiler method). Stir occasionally until smooth.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and pour the melted chocolate onto it. Spread it into an even layer using a spatula.
Sprinkle the chopped almonds and dried cranberries evenly over the chocolate.
Finish with a pinch of sea salt for balance and extra flavor.
Allow the chocolate to cool and set completely at room temperature, or place it in the fridge for quicker setting.
Once hardened, break the bark into rustic pieces and serve or store.
content: Perfect for gifting or snacking, this bark combines rich chocolate with texture and crunch.
tips: Use flaked sea salt for better visual and flavor impact.
Chop toppings uniformly to make the bark easier to slice or snap.
Let the bark cool at room temperature for a glossier finish.

chocolate: Ensure it's dairy-free for a vegan version

pairings.drink: Espresso or a glass of red wine
pairings.occasion: Perfect for holiday gifts or party treats

storage.method: Store in airtight container at room temperature
